page.title: 11OUR SCHOOL POND,FENSTANTON
page.content: { Two years ago in 1983 we decided {to dig a pond at school. { }We made the pond and let the grass and trees grow around it so it looked a bit wild. {In the pond}there are{newts,water {snails,water boat men,water beetles, {and skaters.} I saw{a toad}and it went plop. It scared me.We picked some{snails}and had a close look.You must put them back carefully because they are really fragile. Also we looked at animals{living {around the pond. I saw{butterflys,dragon flies, {damsel flies,}and lots more. Behind the tree stumps there was some{barley.}I picked it up and it seemed to stick to you. We have had a{grass snake}in the pond,swimming.
